snippet: Werth had three hits and two runs batted in, and Adam LaRoche homered for Washington, the National League East leaders.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Washington Nationals defeat Philadelphia Phillies, 3-0; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Werth had three hits and two runs batted in, and Adam LaRoche homered for Washington, the National League East leaders.

headline.seo: Jayson Werth Returns as Nationals Beat Phillies
headline.main: Nationals Top Phillies as Jayson Werth Returns
